website_summaries.verdict: A good skate at a good value price that looks good and offers a smooth ride.
cons: These inexpensive skates have some features, like the bearings, you may want to upgrade, but you can do that if needed

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for skating out the box.
customer_reviews.text: These are OK for the price. The boot is comfortable. I didn't feel any blisters or pressure while skating. The bad news is that the toe stops are absolutely useless plastic placeholders. You will have to replace them. The wheels are flimsy and cheap. I took these skates to the rink but ended up getting a pair of rental skates anyway. It was disappointing. I guess I should have known better. With all the money you would spend upgrading these, you might be better off spending a little more money to get a mid pair mid priced skates.
customer_reviews.author: Taya

customer_reviews.title: Trucks broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bs you not I was skating for the first time down the river trail which is entirely FLAT, all of a sudden I’m going face first into the ground. The bolt on the front truck snapped in half. Now I am messed up and have to walk 3 miles back to my car in socks. I am currently in my way back to my car and will be calling amazon for my money back after I post this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K Saalfrank Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great skate !
customer_reviews.text: We needed something other than the rentals when My husband was teaching our son to skate. These seemed way too good to be true for the price. Let’s just say they outperformed our expectations. Looked like we spent way more IMO. Brought back great memories of skating as a kid. He wears a men’s 9.5-10 and got size 9 as you want them snug. Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Julia D Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Find Something Else
customer_reviews.text: Garbage wheels. Also, be sure to tighten the trucks down. If you allow the trucks to flex, the wheels dig into the skate and wears out the sole of the skates.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Quality control has dipped
customer_reviews.text: I've used Chicago skates for nearly 30 years, so I expected quality when I ordered a (second, larger) pair for my kid. They arrived this morning, dirty and too small (see photos). I am so disappointed with this purchase; I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, not sure how this is an Amazon choice product. I have size 12 flat feet and my toes were suffocated in the front bed of the skate. I would be miserable if I even attempted to skate in these. The inner fabric lining of the skate was already peeling off merely from putting my foot into and taking out of the skate foot bed. Splurge a little bit and opt for a more expensive option. Don't waste your money or time on these poorly constructed skates. Learned my lesson, don't go down the same rabbit hole and take my advice.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Evans

customer_reviews.title: Okay for beginners, but recommend investing for a better pair
customer_reviews.text: These skates are okay for getting started, but the toe-stop and the wheels are not good at all. They won't last ery long. You would basically have to replace everything to really use it outdoors and get good at skating. It's also a point of lack of safety once you start doing more maneuvers. Overall, it seems most skaters don't recommend getting these, and I wish I would've invested in a more expensive pair, but these will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Mien

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size to a size larger.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9/9.5 in normal shoes, but I ordered the 10 and they are snug but comfy. Bearings are gawdawful and tires feel like plastic. Luckily it was a significantly reduced price which is why I gave it 4. If I bought it at full price, it would've struggled for a 3 star rating
customer_reviews.author: Juan Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Wheel came off while skating
customer_reviews.text: While my mother was skating on these for the first time she fell because the wheel came off, she could have seriously hurt herself
customer_reviews.author: Yung.

customer_reviews.title: He says they need to be oiled so they can roll faster and doesn't like the lines on the wheels
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He says they need to be oiled so they can roll faster and doesn't like the lines on the wheels, he says that slows him down. I thought the lines on the wheels improved skating? Either way, he loves them and says they were the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Going back
customer_reviews.text: Skated at the local rink the day these arrived, stopped TWICE and the stopper was worn almost all the way down. The skates are rigid and cheap feeling. Contacted Chicago Skate Co asking for an exchange/upgrade to their higher quality skate and they didn't reply....and I've given them 2 weeks. These are going back. Not worth the price or the poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mixee Bee

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third pair of skates from this company. The first two we had broke within 4-5 months. The skates work really well for the first 4-5 months and then disintegrate rapidly. They are great for the price but if you wanted them to last more than five months I would not go with these. We’ve tried to contact the company and no response. They said they have a warranty but the company will not call or contact you back. Buyers beware if you buy these save the receipt or return them to Amazon within 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is a great skate that has held up really well for outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skate that has held up really well for outdoor rough use. Only caveat, and this just comes from buying experience, is you will not be able to use the nut/bolt type toe stops, like Gumballs for instance. You can only use and replace the sad stops that come with it, as these are held on with a screw. These are hard plastic stops that get shredded down quickly on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: RGardner

customer_reviews.title: Decent skates, worth the loot
customer_reviews.text: These skates are actually a great buy. Great price for some novice skates before or if you decide on diving into the $150-200 range. I’m very satisfied. I replaced the wheels with a higher quality brand and to the softness of my liking but, the ones that come with the skates are fine for indoor use and for beginners. If you’re looking to use these outside, I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND getting you some softer wheels. Only flaw and complaint I have with mine is the leather in the right boot cans with a 1/2 inch long, deep scuff on the top toe area. But, due to having to wait for them in the first place, it’s not worth griping about.
customer_reviews.author: J_Silva

customer_reviews.title: Solid Beginner to Intermediate Skate
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a beginner street skater (intermediate indoor skater experience) in the household and they’ve been pretty pleased with them overall. They use them ~2-4x a week skating 4+ mi each session. Wheels are easy to adjust. Skater reports good control and has only had a handful (less than 5) of minor falls unrelated to the skates themselves. Only minor problem was at first got some foot blisters after extended sessions but a few well-placed bandages avoid that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: The skates are decent. The boot quality feels fine, but the wheels will absolutely not work outdoors if that is what you are looking for. I had to go to a skate shop and spend 100 dollars to get better wheels put on. And since these ones were made in a factory mass produced, it was very difficult for the skate shop guy to even get the wheels off because they were tightened so hard. You will not be able to use the tool that they put in the box to get the wheels off.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stoobs

customer_reviews.title: Good got here and they look very expensive lots of kids at the skating ring really like them
customer_reviews.text: My son has used them for the last two-and-a-half years we had no problem with these skates they were ready to use right out of the box and he is a heavy boy weighing 150 lbs at 10 years old no problems with these skates he looks at getting new skates this Christmas which he deserve and the skates are still in such good shape we are giving them to his friend. We did replace the stoppers after the first year and just replace the bearings the wheels are great
customer_reviews.author: Diana Tandy

customer_reviews.title: Know your maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. I look at other reviews before I bought. I just want anyone else to know if you buy make sure you look into the work needed to fix or repair them. My sons front stopper came off the first time he used them. I had to remove the bottom to get to the nut for it. Also might want to buy better bearings for them if you want them to coast more. Wheels move freely without new ones but doesn’t have ‘roll’, you’ll get if you get better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Turner Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Happy skater!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my son and the only reason they did not get five stars is because he said the arch hurts and I had to buy them a size larger so they would not pinch his toes. He is confident in his abilities when he uses these skates and wants to skate more frequently. I think he prefers the high top style to this kind but that is just because that is what they rent at the rink.
customer_reviews.author: shopfromhome

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, I have never used them.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 wide, so I bought a size 12 hoping for a wider shoe. No luck, the shoe is too narrow for my foot. So, if you have a wide foot, you better look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Maddog From Florida

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These have gone up in price since I've purchased them a couple weeks ago so must be a hot item! I purchased size 6 since I'm a size 7 women but they are a little too loose on me so i may exchange for size down. Keep in mind these are speed skates so the wheels are wider than your standard.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, they track straight, roll nicely
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, fit and feel great, with only one small adjustment they rolled perfectly straight like I wanted. I could not get my previously purchased (and returned) pair to roll straight no matter how I adjusted them, and they cost twice as much. You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: bob spangard

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old had been wanting some skates for a while but was very difficult to find his size and not pay a fortune. Not sure if the whole world started skating during this pandemic or what. He was the most giddy I've seen him in some time. He's now able to go out and skate with his sisters and have a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Skate you should not buy
customer_reviews.text: These skates are horrible for beginners and advanced. Don't waste your money. They're cheaply made, the parts; bearings, wheels, stopper, shoe are all low quality.
customer_reviews.author: IM AMAZIN

customer_reviews.title: The wheel fell off on my first ride!!! No CS!!
customer_reviews.text: Feel apart on my FIRST SKATE!!! I was so disappointed. The front wheel on my right skate just came off while I was skating!!! I didn't even make it maybe 2 block distance. I wrote an email and never received a response. I believe there are still in my trunk. I'll add pictures. DO NOT ORDER!!! Sorry but true!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Braucht

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year son is very pleased with these skates. He loves skating, and he says he can go really fast on them. He did have to go to the skate shop after some adjustments over time, but they've been holding up well. They are comfortable and the wheels can easily be replaced if they wear out. He only uses them in the rink, not outside, so I can't say how that experience would be with these.
customer_reviews.author: Alymom

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing deal. Skate key included. I adjusted the wheels and now, they move like lightning. You can adjust the wheels for your own level. I bought several pairs. One for me, one for my grand daughter and a few for toys for tots.
customer_reviews.author: Gary or StaceyJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Better for indoors but if u want outdoors just change wheels that’s all
customer_reviews.text: These skates are nice for people who already know how to roller skate, doesn’t feel like it’s meant to do stunts but good for a good indoor riding experience, remember to tighten the bolts and make sure wheels aren’t wobbly before using them :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite skates
customer_reviews.text: I used these skates a few years back in high school, had to buy another pair. Got here a day early and I was so excited !!! I got a size 6 (men’s) and I wear a 7.5 women’s and they fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yesi

customer_reviews.title: Quality Skates
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a beginner skater. I really like the wide wheels and that they have ridges. I ordered asize larger and the fit is perfect with a little grow room. The fit is very comfortable when wearing thick socks. I highly recommend these skates.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk. Used for the first time and the truck or whatever snapped in half. Getting a refund ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t know how to skate at all. She loves them
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The wheels broke off the second time they were used. My son is a beginner skater so they were not being abused.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price
customer_reviews.text: They ok. Plastic stopper but the skates are cheaper than others sold on amazon. They run half size small though. Would buy again but go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: JLB

customer_reviews.title: CAN’T GO WRONG BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. Boys 3. Girls 4 1/2-5. Comes with skate key to tighten or loosen wheels to your level. Me, speed demon!!! My kid, barely groovin lol.
customer_reviews.author: Gary or StaceyJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Gave them to my grandson as I ordered the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: They are great but I ordered the wrong size so I gave them to my grandson. I though they'd be cut large in size as they seem to be for men but they are cut to size.
customer_reviews.author: BORN AGAIN

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long term
customer_reviews.text: They were good beginner skates but after about a month of using them my foot is now permanently numb because the the Velcro strap and my feet got the worst blisters from them, the bushings wore out quickly and instead of replacing them I bought VNLA skates for 200 dollars and I am in love with them
customer_reviews.author: Rudy bruce

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Overall the skates are comfortable but the wheels they come with are wide and hard to break in Because they aren’t the smoother wheels as the skates you get on the rental. But the price is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great skates, but they run small. Order a size up
customer_reviews.author: Darling of the job

customer_reviews.title: Great skate for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to skate with my kids. The wheels didnt grip as I expected them to but once I got use to them it was awesome fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nobonz

customer_reviews.title: These guys are a nice fit, but still a little quick for me
customer_reviews.text: These guys are a nice fit,but still a little quick for me, but, I am not giving up, I know I can do this. back in Baltinore, ( in my youth) I was King of the Hil! and I know I can do it again. (I hope) Wish me good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver T

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the product. My daughter is a 6.5 on women shoes and I got her these skates on size 5 on Men. They fit her small, way too tight. Bummed that has to be return.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fast roll
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, very nice durable skates!. Definitely are for professionals but my son loved these.
customer_reviews.author: Lois T

customer_reviews.title: Santa did come to my house!
customer_reviews.text: The skates were a gift for a child I don’t know. They were on his wish list, and I hope he is enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McGaffney

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift idea. True to size
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a surprise for my man. He loved them! Put them on right away! Said they were comfortable. They looked great. Size 11. Came with a skate tool
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Not great at all
customer_reviews.text: Cheap hard wheels with absolutely no shock absorbing capabilties. Rode them once and sold them used
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Millwee

customer_reviews.title: I bought these skates for my 13 hr old son ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my 13 hr old son, he absolutely loves them. His friends bought some since then as well. They were sick of renting skates and now don't have to anymore
customer_reviews.author: Denim Moore

customer_reviews.title: good rollerskates price has gone way down since I skated ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, good rollerskates price has gone way down since I skated back in the 80s. Great skates for the price. High quality throughout; excellent bearings, wheels, stitching work; overall very satisfied for $60 or something.
customer_reviews.author: howsthesky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and they seem to work great for him! He definitely would prefer a boot for more support but they were all out of stock so these were good enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Hendon

customer_reviews.title: they rock
customer_reviews.text: teen has been skating everywhere in these cool looking comfortable roller skates
customer_reviews.author: Irishred

customer_reviews.title: Jessica
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could use them to travel to the grocery store without having to lug out a bike every time. There pretty cheep for the price... knock off a good $18 and thats about how much its worth. The wheals are absolutely terrible if your planing on using them for sidewalks and roads. However, The would be excellent skates for a roller rink. So, for what I needed them for- not the best. But, they are usable. I mean; pretty comfy, Nice fit, Nice color.... Just cant do what I needed them for....
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Price is good.
customer_reviews.text: Received it on time but when I received it I could not use it right away because the screws on the wheels were tight and I had to untighten the wheel and I had to buy a oil lubricant to make the wheels turn. Once I did those it started working properly. The positive side of this is the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Galahad Curry

customer_reviews.title: Best thing you can have for the quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: I had $400 racing skates in the past and these are no different so far. I use these for outside and best thing for this quarantine! I still have my moves and loved being outside getting exercise!!
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates!
customer_reviews.text: Most skates are tacky-looking to me. Trying too hard to be colorful and edgy. THESE skates look like something you'd wear around town if it weren't for the wheels. LOVE them! These are a gift, but I will buy a pair for myself now, jealous as I am of the recipient of my gift!
customer_reviews.author: Nobody in Particular

customer_reviews.title: LOL - tons of fun. My friend decided to get retro and rollerskate ...
customer_reviews.text: LOL - tons of fun. My friend decided to get retro and rollerskate in my neighborhood. So I wanted an inexpensive pair to go with her sometimes. This is great fun! These skates are reasonable price-wise, look good, comfortable to wear, and it's a good way to exercise! :)
customer_reviews.author: mattinCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Skate
customer_reviews.text: First time skating in years. Sled a bit but couldve been the polish on the ring floor. Over all nice fit.. went half size bigger for comfort
customer_reviews.author: Holly A Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Good general skates
customer_reviews.text: Descent quality and design. Replaced original wheels and bearings with higher quality sets.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to see my daughters eyes light up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and plan to let her pick a new pair of laces. I like it and it came pretty fast, but I was disappointed that I had to clean the bottom it looked chalk covered. It is ok I am just glad I opened it first. This is going to make her eyes light up it is her big Christmas present I just want it to be perfect. My rode isn't safe to bike on so I take her to the rollerskating center she has wanted her own pair for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity A Charles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect oair for somebody skating after 25 years
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates. Not too fast , which works perfectly for a 40 year old. I purchased these instead of blades as i was scared of falling :-)
customer_reviews.author: jaycha2

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. The bearings warped within 3 uses to the point they were visibly wobbling and crackled. This is a super cheap skate and not worth it! Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Fine for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be in working order. I tried them on and I have wide feet and they fit just fine. I wear a 9 1/2 women's and got an 8. They are slightly too large.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Okayest skates
customer_reviews.text: Good enough if you just want to some outdoor skates to mess around with, but not suitable for derby. You can't really do much to the trucks, I loosed them a bit, but it didn't really give me more movement. Plate is plastic so it's good for outdoors, but if you want indoor skates metal plates are better. I put on the outdoor wheels I had and changed out the top stop for a block.
customer_reviews.author: MGSkelly

customer_reviews.title: All the great qualities as the "name brand" professional skates for at least $150 + less!
customer_reviews.text: In all my 24 years of skating, I never once, (until now), skated in any other name/brand of skates other than "Carerra's"........ I am amazed with the similarities both skates share. I can skate in "Chicago Bullet's" brand skates with all the same qualities as the "Carerra's" for approx. $180 to $450 CHEAPER! 1000% SATISFIED😄
customer_reviews.author: Kandace moore

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: These skates did not work for me at all. The pair I received did not roll properly. the left skate pulled to the right even after having someone try to fix the problem. The skates were also very wobbly. Maybe they are supposed to be that way, but my daughter has a pair of speed skates and hers does not have that much play in them. I have a pair of regular Chicago skates (old school kind) and they are awesome, but these were very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Nice skate
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had a ball in these skates. Great fit. Runs true to size.
customer_reviews.author: precious

customer_reviews.title: Not sized right.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 10 for my grandson, they are way too small. Fit my son who wears a 9, so they are not sized right. Bought a different pair somewhere else. Trying to sell these now. If can't get them sold will donate to the local roller skating rink.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Karel

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners, wont hurt your ankles
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, or larger people. I bought these to add to my exercise regimen as I remember loving to skate as a kid but as an adult the high ankle skates always hurt my ankles, these were perfect! Feels like wearing a tennis shoe with wheels! The wheels are a bit slower than most speed skates, but its great for beginners just learning.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. No problems with skates. They been used about 3 times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay..what I expected, but was hoping for better
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of skates I bought to start training for roller derby. I didn't want to spend much just in case I didn't get into the sport. These skates are cheap and they don't last very long. I've had parts of the skate fall off with only a few uses and even after tightening the skates feel uneven and it's not the wheels. Overall I expected this quality for the price, but I was hoping to get a bit more used from them before it decided to fall apart. Time to invest in a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: mgl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but hard to skate in
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable but the wheels are very difficult to adjust straight and the rubber stopper inside the trucks wore out in about 5 uses
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: The price on these was great, replaced the bearings within a week (by choice)
customer_reviews.text: As an intro-level skater, I didn't want to dump a lot of money into a set of my own skates. The price on these was great, replaced the bearings within a week (by choice). With the new bearings these skates are darn near perfect! I recommend changing the "brakes" as well. Overall, great for the price, a little uncomfortable after a while, but great skates!
customer_reviews.author: tclark

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: So um they broke the first time I used them, would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eren

customer_reviews.title: Rethink
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. The toe knuckle area bindes smaller than the toe area itself at the stiching. Very uncomfortable. Also... the wheels do not roll...they spin for half a rotation after youe hand leaves the wheel due to thick grease used in the berrings.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my brother on his birthday and he absolutely loves they. They fit great and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: peanut

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These skates are going to cause injuries. I have roller skates and rollerbladed for 35 years and these skates are harmful. The wheels don’t allow you to skate far. You have to go very straight or you will flip or fall. They make you tired because the wheel doesn’t let you go far.
customer_reviews.author: Kanans

customer_reviews.title: Can't get my son to take them off
customer_reviews.text: Theses skates are FANTASTIC. My son started skating around the neighborhood shortly after they arrived. He LOVES them. Good quality, good fit. We will get different wheels for him to use indoors at a skating rink. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: slowpoke73

customer_reviews.title: not well suited for people starting over
customer_reviews.text: the wheels are super hard , there is no give in the skates at all I've used them twice since I purchased them
customer_reviews.author: WV Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not the highest quality item. I think in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality item. I think in this case you get what you pay for. If you use them weekly they will wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Steidinger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son just loves these. He us the talk of the skating rink. He is 10
customer_reviews.author: kingsmom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A little tight across the toes but hopefully they’ll break in. Ok looking. Works great lol
customer_reviews.author: LiveFreeLuvHard

customer_reviews.title: Never forget your first
customer_reviews.text: These were my first pair of skates. I slowly started making changes until what I'm using today is entirely different, but that also changed with my skating skill. I'd say they're on part with R3s, but only if the wheels and toe stop were changed.
customer_reviews.author: Janissary

customer_reviews.title: Good start but replace bearings and wheels
customer_reviews.text: Just took these to rink on day out with the kiddos. First, the boot itself feels great. My feet didn't hurt a bit. However the bearings are sticky and the wheels are not concrete rink worthy. If you replace both you'll have a great set of skates.
customer_reviews.author: Viper123

customer_reviews.title: Skates
customer_reviews.text: the stopper isn't good had to replace it - overall they are good skates.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 10 yr old son he's a really good skater he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: WORST SKATES EVER DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worst skates in my life, injured me after the toe stop flew off and I went to stand. Don't trust these with your life.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The toe stop is not made for an indoor skating rink. Be careful. Do not use it to stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The right thing
customer_reviews.text: 52 year old but I feel 22 when am on them age ITS JUST A NUMBER REMEMBER THAT PEOPLE,🛐🇨🇴
customer_reviews.author: horacio

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: These skates broke the second time my daughter used them. They are very fragile and made of weak materials. The plastic pieces are very thin. She fell and bumped the wheels on the ground and the plastic support for the wheels cracked causing the front wheels to rotate out of position. The entire wheel assembly rotated on the bolt! Very flimsy! Very dissapointing for my daughter as they were a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: MavRick

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used them yet but the value was so good I just couldn't pass it up
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjohn hernandez

customer_reviews.title: He says they are comfortable and make him skate faster
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these skates. He says they are comfortable and make him skate faster lol
customer_reviews.author: itsjustme

customer_reviews.title: So cool I feel like back in time !
customer_reviews.text: They are so cool , you feel like professional !!! Really confortable !!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Valdenrinni

customer_reviews.title: These are amzing and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was amazing and don’t regret it at all i use them every weekend at my local skating rink and they hold up very well and are my favorite pare of skates ive had so far keep ur work up chicago skates:)
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Perfect for beginners. The only thing I noticed is the wheels are meant for indoors only. I had to get wheels meant for outside separately. Overall they are a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: received a blood blister on my second day out toes are crunched Te worst is how the laces always get tangled in the velcro if you buy these or similarskates, do yourself a favor and get some elastic laces
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: I skate once a week now and they hold up great. Good
customer_reviews.text: Skates came quick and had no noticeable damage. I skate once a week now and they hold up great. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: stephen hodge

customer_reviews.title: For the price they are great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves that there fast and the price for the brand

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size 11 was too tight so I exchanged them for a size 12.
customer_reviews.author: AJF

customer_reviews.title: Worst buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst buy ever. There was no oil in the bearings. My son has worn them twice at the skating rink and has had 4 bearings blow out. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and wants to wear them everywhere. We changed out the front stops for ones that are more rubbery. The ones they came with were just hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Papillon Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great skates! They fit good and required no adjustments at all. I hadn't been roller skating in years but was skating just fine within minutes. I forgot how much fun skating was.
customer_reviews.author: Amber R. Gordon

product_meta.title: Chicago Bullet Men's Speed Roller Skate - Black
product_meta.description:
The Chicago Bullet Speed Skate features a controlled low cut boot for greater freedom of movement as well as high quality laces for maximum safety, leaving your foot comfortable and secure. This iconic Bullet Speed Skate from Chicago is strategically designed for racing but is also a popular choice for all-around rink and social skating for decades. Made out of durable and dependable vinyl and an easy lace closure system that allows you to make proper adjustments effortlessly and conveniently while skating. Featuring wide 62mm urethane wheels with precision bearings and premium fixed axels for ultimate control and stability, the high quality speed skates you’re looking for. : Complete with double action adjustable aluminum trucks, high rebound speed urethane wheels, ABEC 1 precision speed bearings, a padded collar with heel pull loop, and a power strap.

AMAZON.COM


This speed skate from Chicago is designed for racing but is also a popular choice for all-around rink and social skating. Made of durable vinyl, the skate's comfortable, low-cut boot allows for freer movement of the ankle as you turn corners and maneuver around obstacles. The wide 62-mm, urethane wheels with precision bearings and fixed axles provide stability and control, while the white front toe breaks offer safe and reliable stopping power. The lace closure system is easy to use and allows you to make the proper adjustments while skating. Available in black, the skate is covered by a 30-day warranty.



Sizing Chart

STABILITY & CONTROL: Featuring wide 62mm urethane wheels with precision bearings and premium fixed axels for ultimate control and stability, the high quality speed skates you’re looking for.
COMFORT FIT: Made out of durable and dependable vinyl and an easy lace closure system that allows you to make proper adjustments effortlessly and conveniently while skating.
